mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doc (s_ca_num, up_perm, d_title, d_content, next, prev) VALUES (null, null, #{d_title}, #{d_content}, null, null);
INSERT INTO doc_history (d_version, d_num, d_date, d_time) SELECT 1, d_num, CURDATE(), CURTIME() FROM doc WHERE d_title = 'C';
mapper.select: select d_num, d_title, d_content from doc where d_num = #{d_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doc_history (d_version, d_num, d_date, d_time) SELECT COALESCE(MAX(d_version), 0) + 1, d_num, CURDATE(), CURTIME() FROM doc_history WHERE d_num = (SELECT d_num FROM doc WHERE d_title = 'C++');
